name: Its harvest time
description:
Simple puzzle game where the task is to harvest all the wheat.

Made for Ludum dare 52

Controls

  • Movement - arrow keys
  • Pause game - escape
  • Mouse in menus

Credits

Music - https://freesound.org/people/Migfus20/sounds/560446/
